languages.text: "Тебе выпал мрачный долг. Но ты проявила последовательность, исполняя его".
"Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."
languages.original_text: "Тебе выпал мрачный долг. Но ты проявила последовательность, исполняя его".

traits.locale_text: "Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."
"Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."
"Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."
"Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."
"Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."
"Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."

languages.text: 「お前のは厳しい聖務だったな。だが、目的を果たすのにひるむことはなかった」
languages.original_text: "Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のは厳しい聖務だったな。だが、目的を果たすのにひるむことはなかった」

languages.text: “你的职责很残酷，但你毫不畏缩地践行了它。”
languages.original_text: "Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."

traits.locale_text: “你的职责很残酷，但你毫不畏缩地践行了它。”

languages.text: « Votre devoir était bien sinistre, mais vous n'avez eu de cesse de l'accomplir. »
languages.original_text: "Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."

traits.locale_text: « Votre devoir était bien sinistre, mais vous n'avez eu de cesse de l'accomplir. »

languages.text: «Debías realizar algo atroz. Pero no vacilaste cuando llegó el momento».
languages.original_text: "Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."

traits.locale_text: «Debías realizar algo atroz. Pero no vacilaste cuando llegó el momento».

languages.text: "Ihr hattet eine grausame Pflicht zu erfüllen. Aber Ihr habt sie erfüllt, ohne zu wanken."
languages.original_text: "Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hattet eine grausame Pflicht zu erfüllen. Aber Ihr habt sie erfüllt, ohne zu wanken."

languages.text: "Vazifen gaddarca olsa da yerine getirirken gözünü bile kırpmadın."
languages.original_text: "Yours was a grim duty. But you were unflinching in fulfilling it."

traits.locale_text: "Gaddarca bir vazifeye sahiptin ama onu yerine getirirken gözünü bile kırpmadın."
